title: Asking me to pay

title: Non existent support!
text:
The app is great however keep in mind that Tele will randomly ban accounts and phone numbers without notification/reason or recourse. 
Once this happens the prompt is to contact ‚Äúsupport‚Äù. But the catch is, there is no support department, so you never get a response from anyone or have any way to reestablish your account or find out why it was banned in the first place. Truly insane.

title: Outdated App just Not Cared About Anymore
text:
This app is old as far as IMs go. That being said it used to be one of the most consistent until around a year or so go. Many newer iPhones specifically encounter a bug where notifications do not pop up until you open the app, leading to many missed important messages and even calls. 

This has been a persistent and known issue to the devs for months now, so if you‚Äôre on iPhone trying to use this app for messaging, don‚Äôt bother. You‚Äôll miss everything and eventually you just won‚Äôt get messaged anymore.

title: Terrible accessibility
text: This app has got to be one of the single most frustrating apps to use with voiceover. scrolling barely works, accessing pinned posts and profiles is a nightmare. Editing my own profile is an exercise and frustration. Accessing channels is completely broken. I can see it right there in my list of chats, but it does nothing. Several updates back, a new interface for sharing images and files was introduced. It is completely inaccessible to voiceover. I cannot share images with any of my friends. On the topic of photos, I am attempting to save an image but Telegram insists on full access to my photo library. I cannot give it full access even when I am in privacy settings. I can only choose between no access and add only. The UX is terrible. The developers should be ashamed.

title: Zero stars

title: Two updates, still same bug issue..,
text:
I‚Äôm not aware if there are other people that have Telegram that have been undergoing a rather peculiar bug where you try accessing a single message, only to be greeted by the app freezing entirely.

Maybe I‚Äôm the only one, but a app-breaking bug like this, has been going on for the previous two updates, and there seems to be no fix for this. I enjoy using telegram, but using it these past few tries have been rather irritating.

I await a update where this bug is fully treated, so that I may enjoy using the app once more. (Lest they want to drive me away from using the app, entirely.)
